basics.name: Tom O
basics.label: Stack
basics.summary: I a software engineer with a deep passion for free software and free culture. I experience organizing events of varying scale on foss technology and. I have helped develop dozens of local groups, particularly in engineering colleges in Hyderabad and Bangalore around free software and love the catalyzing effect it has on the foss community in general.

references.reference: Tom is a truly outstanding senior technologist and I consider myself fortunate to have worked with him.
